mapdata.name: Varanasi Ghats
mapdata.description: The sacred ghats of Varanasi are renowned for spiritual rituals, offering visitors a glimpse of India's cultural heritage.

mapdata.name: Meenakshi Temple
mapdata.description: A historic temple in Madurai, known for its intricate architecture, vibrant sculptures, and spiritual significance.

mapdata.name: Konark Sun Temple
mapdata.description: A UNESCO World Heritage Site, this 13th-century temple in Odisha is an architectural masterpiece dedicated to the Sun God.

mapdata.name: Hampi
mapdata.description: A UNESCO World Heritage Site in Karnataka, known for its ruins of the Vijayanagara Empire and stunning temples.

mapdata.name: Rameswaram
mapdata.description: A sacred town in Tamil Nadu, famous for the Ramanathaswamy Temple and its connection to the Ramayana.

mapdata.name: Valley of Flowers
mapdata.description: A UNESCO World Heritage Site in Uttarakhand, this picturesque valley is known for its vibrant alpine flowers and stunning landscapes.
